intro: A charming world of classic jigsaw puzzles, where cuteness and coziness meet exciting gameplay.
description:
Welcome to Kawaii Girls – a charming world of classic jigsaw puzzles, where cuteness and coziness meet exciting gameplay! 30 delightful images of charming anime girls are waiting for you, which will give you unforgettable emotions.

Each picture is made in a stylish and bright manner, radiating kawaii in every detail – from cute facial expressions to charming outfits. While collecting puzzles, you will enjoy a calm atmosphere and get real pleasure from the process, step by step revealing each scene.

Game features:

• 30 unique illustrations with cute anime girls.
• Classic jigsaw puzzle gameplay – simple and exciting.
• Cute details and kawaii aesthetics at each level.
• Different difficulty levels, suitable for both beginners and experts.
• Cute music.

Collect cute pictures, enjoy the process and dive into the world of kawaii with Kawaii Girls!
